consent.notice: I use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience on my website. By clicking 'I consent', you consent to the use of these technologies.

about.paragraphOne: Hi! I'm Waldo, I'm a software developer and cover artist in my free time.
about.paragraphTwo: On the professional side, I have {as400Age}+ of experience developing for the IBM iSeries platform, {webAge}+ years developing for the web, and {androidAge}+ years developing for the Android platform (native development and React Native framework).
about.paragraphThree: I've been a musician in several bands, and composed music for videogames. Since about {ytAge}+ years I run a YouTube channel where I do versions (covers) of pop songs to the pop punk/emo genres.

content: Skills: Android SDK, CSS3, HTML, Java, Javascript, JEE, jQuery, MySQL, Node, PHP, React Native, RPGLE, Vue.js
- Head of Engineering in Cuprum AFP [2023-Presente]
- Software Engineer in IGT Global Solutions Corporation Chile [2014-2018]
- AS400 Systems Analyst in Banco Occidental de Descuento [2010-2014]
For a detailed overview on my skills and experience please check my LinkedIn.
